oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chess--Early works to 1800

Poetry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Contents: Hebrew MS 5/1 (ff.1a-6a) Hebrew MS 5/2 (ff.9a-31b): printed frontispiece cut out to leave space for Hebrew text. Hebrew MS 5/3 (ff.34a-41b): printed frontispiece cut out to leave space for Hebrew text. Hebrew MS 5/4 (ff.42a-46b): two letters ascribed to Aristotle Â– on prosperity/ethics to Alexander? Hebrew MS 5/5 (ff.47a-50a) Hebrew MS 5/6 (ff.51a-60b): printed frontispiece on f. 51 cut out to leave space for Hebrew (marked "6" on f. 55). Collection of poems by Ibn Esra et al. Hebrew MS 5/7 (ff.62a-74b): printed frontispiece cut out to leave space for Hebrew text. Hebrew MS 5/8 (ff.75a-81a): printed frontispiece cut out to leave space for Hebrew text. Hebrew MS 5/9 (ff.87a onwards): mathematics/algebraic treatise
